One Step Forward (Spanish: Un paso al frente) is a 1960 Spanish comedy film directed by Ramón Torrado. It was shot in Eastmancolor.
Cast
* Manolita Barroso
* Tomás Blanco
* Xan das Bolas
* José Campos
* Germán Cobos
* Rosario Maldonado
* Alfredo Mayo
* Antonio Molino Rojo
* José Nieto
* Julio Núñez
* María del Valle
* Ángel Álvarez
